object.name: MediaType
object.desc: MIME type [MIME] based on IANA registration (see RFC2048) or 'non-digital'.

element.name: MediaType
element.desc: MIME type [MIME] based on IANA registration (see RFC2048) or 'non-digital'.

attribute.name: Name
attribute.desc: The name of the extended element. As it is possible that names for extended elements may collide from agent to agent, it is recommended that the names of extended elements be configurable in an agent, or that agents use URIs for the names of extended elements.

attribute.name: XsiType
attribute.desc: Allows type of element to be explicitly communicated.

attribute.name: SIF_Action
attribute.desc: In a Change event, this flag can be used to indicate an element has been deleted from the parent list container. At a minimum the key for the list must also be present.

attribute.name: SIF_Action
attribute.desc: In a Change event, this flag can be used to indicate an element has been deleted from the parent list container. At a minimum the key for the list must also be present.

object.name: SIF_ExtendedElements
object.desc: The following element is supported at the end of all SIF objects.

element.name: SIF_ExtendedElement
element.desc: A name/value pair, the name being contained in the Name attribute, the value being the element content.

object.name: XMLData
object.desc: Contains an arbitary XML element, encoded in UTF-8

attribute.name: Description
attribute.desc: Contains an optional description of the content or a processing hint with regard to its structure (e.g. named standard, file layout or XSD). Contents may be mandated in instances of this type, or types that follow the AbstractContentPackageType pattern.
